00018 // Checks to make sure the inner node has an extent that matches the extent
00019 // of a parent of nodes whose extents matching the outer extent
00020 //
00021

00031   namespace infnet
00032   {
00033

00040 
00041

00048                         ListIteratorNode* inner,

00056 
00057       const std::string& getName() const;

00059 
00060       const indri::utility::greedy_vector<indri::index::Extent>& matches( indri::index::Extent &extent );
00061     };
